text: This is a list of the cattle breeds considered in France to be wholly or partly of French origin. Some may have complex or obscure histories, so inclusion here does not necessarily imply that a breed is predominantly or exclusively French. The list includes breeds from the overseas territories of France. ==Indigenous breeds== {| class="wikitable" ! Local name(s) !! English name, if used !! Notes !!
